actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A joint resolution to authorize the President to proclaim the period of September 15, 1973, through October 15, 1973, as "Johnny Horizon '76 Clean Up America Month."

summary.text: Authorizes the President to proclaim the period of September 15, 1973, through October 15, 1973, as "Johnny Horizon '76 Clean Up America Month".

titles.title: A joint resolution to authorize the President to proclaim the period of September 15, 1973, through October 15, 1973, as "Johnny Horizon '76 Clean Up America Month."
